name: Special Agency Second edition
description:
The role-playing game Special Agency transports you to a world of investigation and tactical action. With it you can emulate series, novels and movies, putting yourself in the shoes of federal, local and international police agents; or in the shoes of terrorists, mercenaries and criminals, investigating in the streets and fighting with a new level of detail and tension.

This is the second edition of Special Agency: the same Agency, more special. 312 pages with everything you need to bring any action and investigation series, novel or movie to the table.
